name.title: The name of the Ingress Controller

kind.title: The kind of the Ingress Controller

nginxplus.title: Deploys the Ingress Controller for NGINX Plus

debug.title: Runs the container with Delve, expects a version of the IC container with dlv as the entrypoint

enable.title: Runs the container with Delve, expects a version of the IC container with dlv as the entrypoint

continue.title: Starts Delve with --continue which means that IC will not wait for a debugger attach to start

proxyHost.title: The proxy hostname with optional port

proxyCredentialsSecretName.title: The secret containing the proxy username/password combination.  Must contain a `username` and `password` field

ipv6.title: turn on or off ipv6 support

nginxReloadTimeout.title: Timeout in milliseconds which the Ingress Controller will wait for a successful NGINX reload after a change or at the initial start

enable.title: Enable the App Protect WAF module in the Ingress Controller

logLevel.title: The logLevel for App Protect WAF

volumes.title: Volumes for App Protect WAF v5

host.title: Port which the App Protect WAF v5 Enforcer process runs on

port.title: Port which the App Protect WAF v5 Enforcer process runs on

repository.title: The repository of the App Protect WAF v5 Enforcer image

tag.title: The tag of the  App Protect WAF v5 Enforcer image

digest.title: The digest of the  App Protect WAF v5 Enforcer image

pullPolicy.title: The pullPolicy for the  App Protect WAF v5 Enforcer image

repository.title: The repository of the App Protect WAF v5 Config Manager image

tag.title: The tag of the  App Protect WAF v5 Config Manager image

digest.title: The digest of the  App Protect WAF v5 Config Manager image

pullPolicy.title: The pullPolicy for the  App Protect WAF v5 Config Manager image

enable.title: Enable the App Protect DoS module in the Ingress Controller

maxWorkers.title: Max number of nginx processes to support

memory.title: RAM memory size to consume in MB

shareProcessNamespace.title: Enables sharing of the process namespace between pods within the Ingress Controller

logLevel.title: The logLevel of the Ingress Controller

logFormat.title: The logFormat of the Ingress Controller

directiveAutoAdjust.title: Enables automatic adjustment of the NGINX buffers directives

customPorts.title: The customPorts to expose on the NGINX Ingress Controller pod

repository.title: The repository of the Ingress Controller

tag.title: The tag of the Ingress Controller image

digest.title: The digest of the Ingress Controller image

pullPolicy.title: The pullPolicy for the Ingress Controller image

port.title: The port for the startup probe

path.title: The path for the startup probe

initialDelaySeconds.title: Initial delay seconds for the startup probe

periodSeconds.title: Period seconds for the startup probe

timeoutSeconds.title: Timeout seconds for the startup probe

successThreshold.title: Success threshold for the startup probe

failureThreshold.title: Failure threshold for the startup probe

enableSSLDynamicReload.title: Enable dynamic certificate reloads for NGINX Plus

enableWeightChangesDynamicReload.title: Enables weight changes without reloading for NGINX Plus

instanceGroup.title: Set the --instance-group argument for NGINX Agent

dataplaneKeySecretName.title: The Dataplane key is required to authenticate NGINX Agent with NGINX One Console

endpointHost.title: FQDN or IP for connecting to NGINX One Console

endpointPort.title: Port for connecting to NGINX One SaaS Console

instanceManager.title: Configuration for the connection to NGINX Instance Manager

host.title: FQDN or IP for connecting to NGINX Instance Manager

grpcPort.title: Port for connecting to NGINX Instance Manager

sni.title: Server Name Indication for NGINX Instance Manager

tls.title: TLS configuration for connection between NGINX Agent and NGINX Instance Manager

enable.title: enable TLS for NGINX Instance Manager connection

secret.title: kubernetes.io/tls secret with a TLS certificate and key for using mTLS between NGINX Agent and NGINX Instance Manager

caSecret.title: nginx.org/ca secret for verification of Instance Manager TLS

syslog.title: Syslog listener which NGINX Agent uses to accept messages from App Protect WAF

host.title: Address for NGINX Agent to run syslog listener

port.title: Port for NGINX Agent to run syslog listener

collectorBufferSize.title: Buffer size for collector. Will contain log lines and parsed log lines

processorBufferSize.title: Buffer size for processor. Will contain log lines and parsed log lines

customConfigMap.title: The name of a custom ConfigMap to use instead of the one provided by default
